attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Last week I received 17 items of unwanted mail posted by the postman. I chucked it straight in the recycling bin. The environmental costs to produce, transport and recycle these useless pieces of paper are an unnecessary burden on me, the local council and the environment. If we stopped companies producing them, that would be one less thing to damage the environment.
